pr_title: feat: new sample - Models: List model resources contained in a dataset

timeline.message: feat: new sample - Models: List Models

timeline.bodyText: Is this if models is null? We should check models if it'snull and (and throw an error if it is) instead of try/catching
timeline.author: kurtisvg

replies.bodyText: You shouldn't catch NullPointers - prevent it from happening instead.
replies.author: kurtisvg

timeline.bodyText:
This doesn't look right - this is printing as "$ModelId models in dataset listed successfully".
I think you want probably want to do is print something like `Model: modelId = $modelId, modelName = $modelName
timeline.author: kurtisvg

replies.bodyText: Looks like there's only getModelId method to get the model Id. I think I will leave it this way but update to just "model" (instead of "models").
replies.author: stephaniewang526

timeline.author: kurtisvg
